description: API to delete a specific service operating hour for a shop

parameters.name: partner_id
parameters.description: Partner ID is assigned when registration is successful

parameters.name: timestamp
parameters.description: This is to indicate the timestamp of the request. Request to be expired in 3 mins

parameters.name: access_token
parameters.description: The token for API access, using to identify your permission in the api. Sign-in images will get it from your sign-in

parameters.name: shop_id
parameters.description: Shopee's unique identifier for a shop. Required param for logistics APIs

parameters.name: sign
parameters.description: Signature generated in partner_id and salt, timestamp, token_basic_sign_of_other_info parameter sorting

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Name of the special operating hour which you wish to be removed from

response_fields.name: error
response_fields.description: Indicate error type if hit error. Empty if no error happened

response_fields.name: message
response_fields.description: Indicate error details if hit error. Empty if no error happened

response_fields.name: request_id
response_fields.description: The identifier for an API request for error tracking
